user_prompt: Create Epics and User Stories for the usecase

epics.title: User Authentication and Account Security
epics.summary: Implement secure user authentication with multi-factor verification
epics.description: Develop and integrate a secure authentication system that supports multi-factor authentication to protect user accounts. This includes secure password management, SMS/email/OTP verification, and account recovery processes. Focus will be on ensuring session security, encryption of sensitive data, and compliance with banking security standards.

epics.title: Responsive User Interface and Design
epics.summary: Design a responsive, accessible, and user-friendly portal interface
epics.description: Create a modern, intuitive user interface that delivers a seamless user experience across desktop, tablet, and mobile devices. The design should align with brand standards, provide clear navigation, and ensure accessibility for users with disabilities. The layout should dynamically adjust to various screen sizes while maintaining usability.

epics.title: Personalized Dashboard and Profile Management
epics.summary: Develop a personalized dashboard showing relevant banking products and profile data
epics.description: Build a personalized dashboard that displays relevant banking products, offers, and account details based on the user’s profile and eligibility. Include profile management functionality allowing users to update personal information, manage preferences, and view account details in one centralized location.

epics.title: Account Opening and Service Modification Workflows
epics.summary: Implement workflows for account opening and service modification requests
epics.description: Develop guided, low-step workflows that allow users to request new account openings, product applications, and service modifications. The system must support saving incomplete applications, resuming later, and uploading necessary documentation directly through the portal while ensuring validation of mandatory fields and data accuracy.

epics.title: Request Tracking and Notifications
epics.summary: Enable real-time tracking and notifications for requests and applications
epics.description: Implement a notification and request tracking system that provides users with real-time updates on their submitted account requests or service changes. This includes email notifications, in-portal alerts, and a status tracking dashboard. Ensure consistency and clarity in message templates and delivery triggers.

epics.title: Activity History and Audit Trail
epics.summary: Maintain a history of user interactions and requests
epics.description: Develop a comprehensive activity log that records all user interactions, transactions, and changes made through the portal. The audit trail should be easily accessible to users and administrators for transparency while ensuring compliance with data retention and security policies.

epics.title: Core Banking and Third-Party Integrations
epics.summary: Integrate the self-service portal with existing core banking systems
epics.description: Establish secure and scalable integration between the self-service portal and the bank’s core banking system using APIs or middleware. Ensure synchronized data flow for account, transaction, and product information. Handle exceptions and downtime through retry mechanisms and error monitoring.

epics.title: Role-Based Access Control
epics.summary: Implement authorization levels and secure access to features
epics.description: Develop role-based access control mechanisms to ensure users only view and access services relevant to their roles and authorization levels. Configure privileges for customers, administrators, and support staff. Align access policies with data privacy and compliance regulations.

epics.title: Performance Optimization and Reliability
epics.summary: Ensure high availability, speed, and database performance for the portal
epics.description: Establish performance benchmarks and monitoring tools to ensure the portal operates efficiently under high load. Optimize database queries, implement caching mechanisms, conduct load testing, and set up automated monitoring and alert systems to maintain reliability and responsiveness.

- Accounts are recoverable through secure processes.
